category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 6 (Training Plan Investigation and Notification)
contents: Article 6 (Training plan survey and notification) ① In order to establish a training plan, the athlete village head shall survey the heads of member sport organizations on the annual training needs of each organization. ② The athlete village head establishes a training plan reflecting the annual training needs of each member sport organization and then notifies the member sport organization head of the training plan.
